data.name: DrugApp
data.description: App to manage drugs, with reminders of quantity and expiry. Final project of UniSa iOS Developer Academy Course.

data.name: Robot Vision Cup 2016
data.description: Using an Aldebaran NAO to recognize some markers or objects and move or behave accordingly. Responsibilities: Development, Documentation

data.name: GS & GSA Pansharpening
data.description: IDL project to develop Gram-Schmidt & Gram-Schmidt Adaptive method for pansharpening in remote sensing application. ERGAS, SCC, SAM and Q4 indexes to evaluate the fusion methods.

data.name: Health Classification Eased
data.description: Multiplatform mobile application aiming to ease the access to medical classifications. Responsibilities: Design, Development, Documentation

data.name: BasketLED
data.description: System for automatic basket points sensing using a ST microcontroller and self-chosen sensors, final project for the Embedded System course.

data.name: Space Invaders
data.description: Space Invaders replica using Java technologies. Final project for the Software Engineering course. Responsibilities: Design, Development, Documentation
